title: Random Icon
body: Logged in and got a random icon, anyone know what for?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uQNAs1xH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-14T21:58:54.870+0000)
>
> [Riot games 10th birthday! ](http://www.riftherald.com/2016/9/13/12896610/free-riot-kayle-skin-lol-ip-boost-anniversary)

I didn't get it. Time to gatecrash. Where's the tequila at?
Im guessing it was given out based on timezones, that would explain the lack of reddit posts aha.
